channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Millions of Americans brace for winter storm. And, Zelenskyy's warning for Europe
item.description: Millions of Americans are bracing for a massive, life-threatening winter storm this weekend. And, Ukrainian President Zelenskyy delivers a stark message to Europe at the World Economic Forum in Davos.
item.content:encoded:
Millions of Americans are bracing for a massive, life-threatening winter storm this weekend. And, Ukrainian President Zelenskyy delivers a stark message to Europe at the World Economic Forum in Davos.

(Image credit: Will Newton)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: How cuts to federal climate funds could threaten polar vortex research
item.description: Tens of millions of people are in the path of a major winter storm. Federal cuts threaten efforts to understand the causes of such weather.
item.content:encoded:
Tens of millions of people are in the path of a major winter storm. Federal cuts threaten efforts to understand the causes of such weather.

(Image credit: George Walker IV)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Hersher

item.title: Who's Board of Peace and who's bored of peace? The quiz knows — do you?
item.description: Plus: The Oscars, tool-using animals, Nobel drama and more.
item.content:encoded: Plus: The Oscars, tool-using animals, Nobel drama and more.
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: Ice may be more hazardous than snow this weekend. What to expect and how to prepare.
item.description: A major winter storm is expected to impact more than 200 million people in United States this weekend. Freezing rain and ice is a particular concern.
item.content:encoded:
A major winter storm is expected to impact more than 200 million people in United States this weekend. Freezing rain and ice is a particular concern.

(Image credit: Rick Loomis)
item.dc:creator: Anusha Mathur

item.title: 'Pain, betrayal, sadness': Danish veterans describe shock of Trump admin rhetoric
item.description: Danish veterans say the rhetoric from the Trump administration has been painful. They describe feeling betrayed and abandoned by an ally after standing shoulder to shoulder with American soldiers.
item.content:encoded:
Danish veterans say the rhetoric from the Trump administration has been painful. They describe feeling betrayed and abandoned by an ally after standing shoulder to shoulder with American soldiers.

(Image credit: IDA MARIE ODGAARD/Ritzau Scanpix)
item.dc:creator: Barbara Sprunt

item.title: How President Trump has challenged a constitutional foundation
item.description: In his first year back in the White House, President Trump has presided over a sweeping expansion of executive power while eroding democratic norms.
item.content:encoded: In his first year back in the White House, President Trump has presided over a sweeping expansion of executive power while eroding democratic norms.
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: How Minnesota became the center of a political crisis
item.description: In the days leading up to Renee Macklin Good's death, the political situation in Minneapolis had turned combustible. Her shooting has exposed how colliding forces set the stage for the ongoing crisis.
item.content:encoded:
In the days leading up to Renee Macklin Good's death, the political situation in Minneapolis had turned combustible. Her shooting has exposed how colliding forces set the stage for the ongoing crisis.

(Image credit: Pool)
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: The Trump administration admits even more ways DOGE accessed sensitive personal data
item.description: New court documents reveal even more ways DOGE improperly accessed and shared sensitive personal data last year — and how that data appears to have been used to advance dubious fraud claims.
item.content:encoded:
New court documents reveal even more ways DOGE improperly accessed and shared sensitive personal data last year — and how that data appears to have been used to advance dubious fraud claims.

(Image credit: Kayla Bartkowski)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: Trump pushes his power to new heights with help from loyal lieutenants
item.description: As President Trump finishes the first year of his second term, it is clear there are fewer guardrails than last time.
item.content:encoded:
As President Trump finishes the first year of his second term, it is clear there are fewer guardrails than last time.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Statewide economic blackout against ICE to be held in Minnesota Friday, Zelenskyy gives scorching critique of Europe in Davos speech, millions of Americans prepare for massive winter storm.
item.content:encoded: Statewide economic blackout against ICE to be held in Minnesota Friday, Zelenskyy gives scorching critique of Europe in Davos speech, millions of Americans prepare for massive winter storm.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez
